attributes.review:
It wouldn’t let me download with my fingerprint because of the fact that I’m a poc so I had to use my password and even then it took ages to download. I can’t believe how terrible it glitches and made my phone lag after all I just want to see all the.. justice.. and equality our president spreads. I mean what good Christian wouldn't hold their bible upside down and what good president wouldn’t tell police to use force on peaceful protesters..

Gen-Z✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: Terrible terrible terrible!

attributes.review: This app took 4 DAYS to download. After it finally downloaded i went into my other apps and I kept getting weird advertisements of graphic inappropriate pictures. I dont know if the Donald Trump app did this but it started happening ever since I downloaded it. Also every time I open the app it would crash and shut down my phone completely . This app will ruin your phone do not buy it.
attributes.title: Do not recommend

attributes.review: I have never in my life written a review but this app has pushed me to do so. As a muslim trump supporter I believed trump wasn’t racist. but once i opened the app it started swearing at me and calling me names you wouldn’t want to know. i would usually excuse trumps racist past but it has pushed the limit. i am now on the streets homeless because the app has made me so. this is my truth and i encourage everyone else to say theirs too❤️. if i could rate it zero stars i would
attributes.title: the app is racist🤬🤬

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded in my whole life...and I’ve had best fiends. Took hours to download, the app always crashes, the functions were designed in the least user friendly way possible. It’s just one terrible glitchy mess. I would expect much better from the president with such a large campaigning budget. I guess he just chooses to allocate money into other worthless causes. That’s besides the point... DONT DOWNLOAD 🤮
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: this app took 2 weeks to download and made my phone crash multiple times. my phone is the brand new iphone 11 and has NEVER crashed before, also this app was the only app i downloaded therefore the problem is this app. do not get it! i’m on my way to get a new phone now since it won’t come back on and i’ve tried charging it and nothing would happen, apple even said “it was the trump 2020 app”!!!
attributes.title: bad app

attributes.review:
THIS APP IS TERRIBLE. I downloaded it so I could DEFINITELY support the trump campaign🥵. Sadly when I opened this app it admitted a terrible frequency that ended up with my dog profusely seizing. I had to fully shut down my phone for it to stop😶😶. Then later that day my turtle 🐢 started drowning and then it threw up.😕😢. I guess what I am trying to articulate, if you download this app your grandma with start profusely crying then she will die❤️🧚🏿‍♀️🧚🏿‍♀️             
#Bernie2020 #SettleForBiden #SaveBarron2020😎😎
attributes.title: Almost caused my dog to die

attributes.review: I would give a negative rating if I could! The app glitches my phone soooo much and it took days to download 🥴 it makes me phone reek of onions and attracts all kinds of animals into my home 🥺 the amount of notifications it sends me oh my god. One time it asked me to send baby feet pics. Absolutely disgusting. Do not download. If you are smart enough leave another bad rating because it needs to be taken down! TikTok lives matter!!!!
attributes.title: Absolute TRASH 🥴🧚‍♂️🦋🥵🥰

attributes.review: i downloaded the app, which took 3 years even tho i have good wifi, and as soon as i opened it my house got robbed because there are people who track every single person who downloads it and kills their family. my family is now dead and i can never go back to my house because the criminals are now using it as their main base. i would never wish this on anyone....DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
attributes.title: absolutely and utterly awful 😡😡

attributes.review: I was so excited to try out this app by mr corn dog, i saw it all over tiktok how this app is wonderful but when I downloaded it and launched the app, my PHONE EXPLODED I HAVE TO BUY A NEW PHONE TOOK ME ABOUT 2 MONTHS. Anyways, my phone caught on fire because of this app how it makes my phone burns like hell and my house caught on fire. Im currently living in my friends house now, next week is my fish’s funeral and my mr corn dog poster burned into ashes and my trump collection too, i love mr corn dog but this app is a no no.
attributes.title: I got sent to hell for this

attributes.review: Absolute worst app. Not user friendly. Gave me hives and made me cry. It took almost 4 years to download and provided me with practically nothing. Can’t keep promises including, but not limited to, eliminating federal debt which is actually up, not down, hasn’t even released tax returns and we can’t forget the promise to sue “accusers” of sexual misconduct. Now those are all signs of guilt. Plus it’s ugly. Hate the way it looks on my phone. THE WORST I’d give it no stars if I could.
attributes.title: Just the worst...
